text: @realDonaldTrump Joe wasn't offering up Clorox Chewables as a remedy for Covid19, or demonizing American citizens for exercising their 1st Amendment rights, or waxing poetic abt his bromance with a murderous dictator and showing love letters from said dictator. Hush, traitor.
